DOC.brief_summary: A study in males and females with elevated Lp(a) to look at the effects of TA-8995 on Lp(a) levels.
DOC.brief_title: A Study on the Effects of TA-8995 on Lp(a) in Subjects With Elevated Lp(a)
DOC.criteria: Male and female (of nonchild bearing potential) subjects with elevated Lp(a) levels Clinically significant medical history Abnormal laboratory results (other than lipid levels) or vital signs Receiving any other drug therapy
